bill.title: Campaign Finance
bill.description: Organizes, clarifies, updates, and recodifies campaign finance laws. Effective January 1, 2010. (HB215 HD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-12-09 2:05 PM in House conference room 325.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 02-17-2009.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02/17/09 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, Ito, Cabanilla, Herkes, Luke, Mizuno, Morita, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Wakai; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti, Marumoto, Thielen; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, McKelvey.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 618) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Ward voting no (1) and Bertram, McKelvey, Takai, Takumi, Tokioka excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-27-09 4:00pm in House conference room 308.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 03-02-09.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Monday, 03-02-09 5:44pm in conference room 308.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 03-03-09.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-03-09 7:00PM in conference room 308.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 03-04-09.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 03-04-09 4:15PM in conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Aquino, Awana, Choy, Coffman, Har, Keith-Agaran, Nishimoto, Sagum, Tokioka, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Brower, C. Lee, Wooley, Pine, Ward; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 946) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 3-10-09.
(H) Recommitted to FIN with none voting no and Representative(s) Takai excused.
Carried over to 2010 Regular Session.
